column4: lolol, i lost alot data in a format i didn't need (it didn't remedy the issue i thought it would)

I would suggest using dd to make an image of the partition with deleted data and play with that
that autopsy wants images of the disk
Yes, use dd and make an image
e.g.? dd /dev/myDrive /myImage?
input file and output file, 'dd if=/dev/myDrive of=/myImage'
for $3000 worth of data, i have the time
